categories.summary:
# Discord Chat Analysis

## 1. Summary
The chat primarily focused on finding and converting VRM avatar models, particularly of specific characters like Santa, Link, and Mario. Community members shared resources for obtaining these models, including toxsam's open source collection (opensourceavatars.com) and Vroid Hub. The discussion also touched on technical aspects of converting GLB format models to VRM, with suggestions about renaming rigging or using intermediate conversions through FBX and Mixamo. A specific Mario model was identified and shared. Additionally, there was a brief mention of "Drifters" models being optimized for VRM format soon.

## 2. FAQ
Q: Has anyone seen a VRM avatar of Santa, Link (Zelda), or Mario (Brothers)? (asked by CarTarL) A: There's a Santa VRM in toxsam's open source collection, and a Mario model on Vroid Hub (answered by Shiffty and hiroP)
Q: I found a few that are in glb format. Would have to rename all the rigging to get into vrm? (asked by CarTarL) A: If it's already rigged, you just need to assign the bones with the blender VRM plugin (answered by ğ•½ğ–”ğ–šğ–˜ğ–™ğ–†ğ–“)

## 3. Help Interactions
Helper: Shiffty | Helpee: CarTarL | Context: Looking for VRM avatars of specific characters | Resolution: Shared link to opensourceavatars.com for Santa VRM
Helper: hiroP | Helpee: CarTarL | Context: Looking for VRM avatars of specific characters | Resolution: Shared Vroid Hub link and specific Mario model
Helper: BallisticBanana | Helpee: CarTarL | Context: Converting GLB models to usable format | Resolution: Suggested converting GLB to FBX then using Mixamo for rigging
Helper: ğ•½ğ–”ğ–šğ–˜ğ–™ğ–†ğ–“ | Helpee: CarTarL | Context: Converting rigged models to VRM | Resolution: Advised using Blender VRM plugin to assign bones

## 4. Action Items
Technical: Use Blender VRM plugin to assign bones when converting rigged models to VRM | Mentioned By: ğ•½ğ–”ğ–šğ–˜ğ–™ğ–†ğ–“
Technical: Convert GLB to FBX then use Mixamo for rigging when needed | Mentioned By: BallisticBanana
Feature: Wait for upcoming optimized Drifters VRMs release | Mentioned By: ğ•½ğ–”ğ–šğ–˜ğ–™ğ–†ğ–“

The chat segment is extremely brief, containing only a few messages from a user named MUDBONE. There are no technical discussions, decisions, or problem-solving activities present in this limited exchange. The user appears to be asking about a Minecraft-type game project and its relationship to an existing token on Solana, but there are no responses or technical content to analyze.
